A REST controller that provides a unified proxy endpoint for routing requests to external integrated tools, supporting all HTTP methods and comprehensive API documentation.

## Key Components

- **`proxyApiRequest()`** - Main endpoint handler that accepts requests for any tool and HTTP method, then delegates to RestProxyService
- **`RestProxyService`** - Injected service dependency that handles the actual proxying logic
- **Path Mapping** - Uses `{toolId}/**` pattern to capture tool identifier and forward remaining path segments
- **Header Extraction** - Captures user ID and API key ID from request headers for authentication context
- **Comprehensive HTTP Method Support** - Handles GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, and OPTIONS requests

## Usage Example

```java
// The controller automatically routes requests like:
// GET /tools/github/api/v1/repos -> proxied to GitHub API
// POST /tools/slack/api/chat.postMessage -> proxied to Slack API
// PUT /tools/custom-tool/data/123 -> proxied to custom tool

// Example request headers that would be captured:
// X-User-Id: user-123
// X-API-Key-Id: key-456

// Error handling returns appropriate HTTP status codes:
// - 400 for tool errors
// - 401 for authentication failures  
// - 404 for unknown tools
// - 500 for internal server errors
```

The controller includes comprehensive Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for automatic API documentation generation and supports request body forwarding for POST/PUT/PATCH operations. All requests are logged with tool ID, path, method, and user context for debugging and monitoring purposes.
